title: Commute time at Glance
content:
Hi there, 

in pre Corona time  my Commute traveling time was shown every morning and this was really helpful because I knew should I leave my home right away or I can take my time.  
Now when we started our working times normal this very helpful feature is not shown on my Pixel phone,  I have tried to delete it from google maps and then write it back again but it did not help. In this 3 months of home office I did not change anything of my settings (as I remember) only usual updates. 
I am talking of course about "at glance" feature, please help :) 

thanks
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
